name: Professor Bubbles
description: A retro style platformer in 90s style. Be prepared for fast pace, precisely timed jumps, exploration, pixel bouncy pandas and sleep walking bunnies! If you like commander keen flavoured with kaizo mario, then this is spot on your game.

name: Pop'n Music 3 Append Disc
description:
Pop'n Music 3 Append Disc (ポップンミュージック3 アペンドディスク) is the sequel to Pop'n Music 2. It was released for the Sega Dreamcast and is designed to be used with the Pop'n Music Controller.
As the title may suggest, this version of Pop'n Music 3 is not a full game - it instead requires the user to boot up Pop'n' Music 2 and switch discs to access the extra content.

name: BattleTubers
description: The Digital Media Acquisition Creature and his army of CopyWright Creeps have invaded Vtuber worlds! Gather a group of friends and battle as one of your favorite Twitch streamers to defend their homes!

name: pareidolia in █▄██▄▄
description: angel dressup and selfie simulator with pure love between girls. created for yurijam.

name: Super Smash Bros. Ultimate: Competitive Playable Bosses
description: This mod makes the bosses from World of Light playable on standard versus matches.

name: Cat Fantasy
description: A cyberpunk, anime-style 3D turn-based RPG, where cats transform into anime girls.

name: Sonic & Sega All-Stars Racing Arcade
description: An arcade port of Sonic & Sega All-Stars Racing.

name: Angry Birds Hatchery Island
description:
Angry Birds Hatchery Island is a cancelled game based on the Angry Birds series. The game featured a new mode called Hatchery, alongside the ability to make custom birds.

An early prototype build of the game was leaked on December 17th, 2023 during the TestFlight teraleaks.

name: Angry Birds Breaker
description: Angry Birds Breaker is an unreleased Angry Birds game. The game was mentioned in the TestFlight teraleak, however no prototype is currently publicly available.

name: Promise Me, You'll Live
description: A romance visual novel created in four days for the Velox Turbo game jam on Itch. You play as The Crossroad Keeper, the holder of thousands of promises and second chances.

name: Forlorn
description:
Forlorn was an unreleased 2D platformer developed by RobTop Games in 2012. The game was meant to release for mobile devices, however was scrapped before completion.

Various prototype builds of the game leaked in 2023 as a part of the TestFlight teraleaks.

name: Bugs Bunny
description: Bugs Bunny is a cancelled game based on the Looney Tunes series for the Atari 2600. The game features Bugs Bunny as he tries to hide from Elmer Fudd.

name: Wilder: Bahadur's Story
description:
In a world where djinn are slaves and humans their masters, can two souls drawn together from opposite sides of the divide truly find happiness? Can they find freedom?

Bahadur has served as your family's valet for many years, and has always been your loyal companion. But he has never known a life outside the city; a life without chains.

You are the niece of an important nobleman and have lived a sheltered existence. Your whole life, you have never truly questioned the way things are.

That is about to change.

Wilder: Bahadur's Story is the second story in the Wilder collection, a series of visual novels featuring a female protagonist, hundreds of choices, two endings, and a romance that breaks all the rules.

name: Battle Chess
description:
NES Port of Battle Chess

Did someone tell you chess is a civilized game played by civilized people? Forget it. Chess is war - a ruthless, cutthroat battle where one warrior lives to fight again and the other is left on the battlefield. With BATTLE CHESS you don't just imagine the battles, you experience them! You'll hear the clank of armor, as you watch dramatic, 3-dimensional animations of courageous heroes fight to protect their king. BATTLE CHESS is the most incredible chess game you've ever seen - where empires can be won - or lost!

name: Disney's Beauty and the Beast

name: Noelle's Forest Adventure
description:
Noelle's forest adventure is a standalone adventure about NOELLE.

It takes place in the light world and it is about Noelle going out to visit her sister and gift her a Gladious. She explores FARAWAY FOREST, a forest filled with dangerous insects to fight in Deltarune style combat with a light world twist, as well as traces from memories in the past from all sorts of people. Can you reach Dess and give her Noelle's gift? The game has 4 endings to obtain, depending on your actions!

Enjoy an OMORI inspired mini adventure featuring Noelle! (This game can be played without having played OMORI, it isn't a crossover with OMORI)

name: Bokosuka Wars
description: This game revolves around a leader who must lead an army in phalanx formation across a battlefield in real-time against overwhelming enemy forces while freeing and recruiting soldiers along the way, with each unit able to gain experience and level up through battle. The player must make sure that the leader stays alive, until the army reaches the enemy castle to defeat the leader of the opposing forces. The game was responsible for laying the foundations for the tactical role-playing game genre, or the "simulation RPG" genre as it is known in Japan, with its blend of role-playing and strategy game elements. The game has also variously been described as an early example of an action role-playing game, an early prototype real-time strategy game, and a unique reverse tower defense game. In its time, the game was considered a major success in Japan.

Mario gets invited to explore a haunted manor in this unconventionally-structured major hack.

Solve puzzles, collect keys, and fight enemies to uncover the mystery of the manor

name: Age of Empires Mobile
description: Embark on an exhilarating adventure in the brand-new Age of Empires world and forge unbreakable bonds with friends anytime and anywhere! Dive into an epic war strategy experience with rich real-time controls, stunning visuals and historical heroes on grand battlefields. Seize the reins of your empire, rally allies from every corner of the globe, and reclaim your once radiant glory!

name: Shkilagames Story: Episode 1
description: Sin descripción

name: Lost Traces: Unsolved Cases - False Awakening
description: Lost Traces: Unsolved Cases - False Awakening is an indie atmospheric horror game that puts a lot of emphasis on storytelling and puzzle-solving.

name: Run Elephant Run
description: Just keep going.

name: Fighters of Capcom
description:
Fighters of Capcom is a cancelled mobile fighting game by Capcom that started development in 2012. The game was a crossover game featuring characters from various Capcom games.

In December 2023, various prototype builds of the game were leaked online as a part of the TestFlight teraleak.

name: Tru Or Die: Chiraq
description: Step into the gritty and unforgiving streets of Chicago with "Tru or Die Chiraq: Streets of Power," a compelling hood game that puts you in the shoes of a member of the infamous Tru or Die gang. This is your chance to rise to the top in the cutthroat world of Chiraq's street gangs.

name: Demon Turf: The Tower
description: You've been stripped of all your powers and there's only one way to regain them: Climb the Jester's impossibly high tower! Can you overcome all of the hazardous challenges and gain back your abilities, one by one? All it takes is one slip up and you'll have to start over... You'll be sweating, you'll be swearing but with each attempt you'll climb just a bit higher... And just that much closer to beating this incredibly tough challenge! Good luck, fellow demon!

name: The D Show
description: Essentially a Disney version of the You Don't Know Jack series, up to three players play a trivia game show to prove their knowledge of The Walt Disney Company.

name: Chat Guess Games
description:
Chat Guess Games is a community game for Twitch Streamers. A game for your community to battle it out and see who truly knows the most about video games!

Screenshots, artwork, genres, release year and more are displayed on screen and chat races to guess the correct game first!

name: Christmas Horse 4
description: ESCAPE CAPTIVITY. You wake up in the Elves' HQ. What dangers and secrets will you find during your escape?

name: Bruxa Luna
description: The game is about two witches who go on a journey to train. One is called Luna and the other Luana.

name: Magic Witches
description: Game made for Teacher Lucas Game Jam.

name: Seven: Drowned Past
description: Seven: Drowned Past introduces a whole new story line, including: additional opponents, new skills to implement, terrains to parkour, eight new quests, and about 7 hours of gameplay, all for free to owners of Seven: The Days Long Gone.

name: Fragrant Story: Papaya's Path
description: Fragrant Story: Papaya's Path is a free update for Fragrant Story. This update adds a significant amount of content, and is much larger than the original game.

name: Beatmania 6thMIX + Core Remix
description: Final PlayStation beatmania release. Contains all of the songs from beatmania 6thMIX, all of the new songs from beatmania Core Remix, four long versions from beatmania III Append 6thMIX, and six new remixes.

name: Driving Homeicide
description: Driving Home(icide) is a focused and humorous single-player driving experience as you, the self-driving AI, must deliver your increasingly inebriated and distracting owner for their night on the town. Survive the increasingly difficult levels as your owner ramps up their 'help' and deliver them home in once piece.

name: Masters of the Universe
description: The battle for Eternia is in your hands! A Masters of the Universe themed Barbarian remake for Pico-8. Side with He-Man and his allies or Skeletor and his minions in this new take on the classic Barbarian sword fighting game. Battle 8 levels against increasingly difficult foes or play against a friend. You have the power!

name: Wrigglui
description: Full moon has arrived and the fireflies, including Wriggle Nightbug, begin preparing their adventures. Like many visual novels, the gameplay in Wrigglui follows an interactive branching plot line with multiple scenarios. There are five main plot lines that the player will have the chance to experience, and five endings depending on the decisions that the player makes during the game.

name: TeleCollision
description: A story-driven turn-based RPG with action command style combat.

name: Diam's
description: If someone steals your diamonds... What will you do?

name: Touhou Rakuryuusei: The Shattered Sky
description: Touhou Rakuryuusei ~ The Shattered Sky is a fan-made Touhou Project game made using the Touhou Danmakufu ph3 shooting game engine, programmed by Eredom of Dream Compass with music by Abner and character art by Moonturret. The game was released on 23 June 2017, and features 6 stages and 3 Extra stages. The game features 3 playable characters.

name: Tennis Esports
description:
Welcome to Tennis Esports, the virtual tennis application that combines the excitement of virtual reality tennis with the competition and fun of tennis. Play with real tennis swings, and immerse yourself in the ultimate world of virtual sports from virtually anywhere.

Tennis Esports is as realistic as virtual sports gets, replicating all the spins and swings you can even enhance your experience with a VR Tennis handle! For beginner players wanting to give tennis a go, to amateur tennis fans and avid players, Tennis Esports is a fun and useful tool to learn and enjoy tennis at any level from your school, office or home!

Build up your skills and compete in live matches, and climb the global rankings on the Tennis Esports Tour, challenge yourself with MirrorPlay, or become addicted to the excitement of HitEmAll, our famous arcade tennis target game.

With Tennis Esports you can play in a stadium, on any surface with a small or a big space. Get fit playing running mode against our AI opponents or enable voice chat with Instant and Custom match play. Set up your own player profile and create your own virtual tennis avatar where you can see your skills, unlock prizes and represent your country!

Tennis Esports is for gamers, tennis players and sports fans of all ages. Join the Tennis Esports community on Discord to find players and keep up to date with competitions, find friends, opponents and win prizes!

name: Revelation M
description:
"Revelation M" is fantasy MMORPG with a stunning three-dimensional world where you are free to explore the sky and travel through the sea. Your brightest dreams will come true in the game; there are surprises everywhere, and you can discover the hidden truth in rich adventures; there are challenges and difficult dungeons that will require all of your skills and courage; you will find an elaborate system of profession development, which will help your character to unlock its potential in the best possible way; new face creating system gives you a wide range of options for selecting details and customization!

This version of Revelation M innovated upon the predecessor PC version with several design and development philosophies.

name: Sonic XG
description: Sonic eXtended Genesis, aka Sonic XG, is a Sonic fangame created by Euan "Sir Euan" Gallacher and Joseph "Nitemare" Waters, and has gone through many different variations in the past. Its most recent build was released on August 17th, 2023.

name: Cracking the Cryptic: GAS Volume #1
description: A pack of 60 Genuinely Approachable Sudokus (“GAS”) from the brilliant minds of Clover, Sam Cappleman-Lynes and Philip Newman.

name: Doodle Baseball
description: An arcade-style baseball game Google Doodle released in the US for July 4th.

name: Koi Hai Tunnel
description:
The main character, Kudao, was invited by childhood friends Sazane and Tamao. They travel to an abandoned tunnel, rumored to be haunted.

An unexpected situation occurs in the tunnel...?

name: Emo Quest XD
description: A Quest about Soul, Love and Emotion, inspired by retro rpg style!

name: Minecraft Alpha 0.0.0
description: Minecraft Alpha 0.0.0 is scarier version of Minecraft Alpha 1.2.6

name: The Last Revenant
description:
Made for the 22nd Metroidvania Month Game Jam, The Last Revenant is an atmospheric sci-fi action metroidvania with horror elements, multiple upgrades to collect and a short but engaging story to uncover.

Over 1200 years into the future, the last of a series of faulty cryosleep pods finally collapses open on a faraway lunar outpost. Sombre, a poor soul with little left of their original form, is serving their sentence on a barren moon with no way to call for help. The only possibility of survival lies in an abandoned comms satellite located in low orbit, which they can only reach by collecting items to survive the harsh journey across and beyond the facility. Entrusted with a spare Hookshot, Sombre will have to try and upgrade this tool to cling to salvation.

But what happened to the rest of the research colony, and their bodies..?

name: Sands of Mars
description: After Dr. Grady and some other members of the archeologic Explorer II expedition on planet Mars went missing, it is your task to find them and bring them back home safely. You start your mission by outfitting your space ship with all nessecary supplies. After having blasted off to space you encounter asteroid fields, enemey spacecraft but also friedly space traders. At last, after landing on Mars you find the remnants of the two ancient alien species which once lived on our red neighbour - the insectoid Zanti and the reptilian Meshim.

name: Beneath the Pyramids
description: Sin descripción

name: The Asteroid Field
description: Asteroids clone for the Apple II.

name: Project Vic
description: You grab your equipment and drive to a forest parking lot near the crime scene. There you find the first clues that the extent of this family tragedy appears to be far greater than you first suspected.

name: Lohotronshchik: Crazy Loto
description: Minigame kiosk from Rudolf Lachinov, originated from his school project. Earn money by playing any of 53 games in the kiosk with all graphics sculpt of plasticine. Fishing from aquarium, shooting gallery, variety of card games, Pac-man and Snake clones - this kiosk has it all to win!

name: Boing Odyssey
description: Embrace your creative side and build with an array of physics bending tools to solve puzzles, or create and share your own!

name: Mystic Balloon
description: Sin descripción

name: Garten of Banban 7
description: Explore the monster-occupied levels of Banban’s Kindergarten. Survive the dreads that reside below as you are now completely on your own. Uncover the truth behind the place, and find the whereabouts of your missing child…

name: Ao no Kanata no Four Rhythm Extra1+2P
description: A bundle that includes Ao no Kanata no Four Rhythm Extra1 and Extra2 in one package, featuring the side stories between Mashiro and Misaki.

name: The Anomaly 3: Tower
description: Latest in digs' Anomaly series featuring trademark mind tricks, map hacks and surprises. Dressed in a medieval/wizard theme with many textures and visual flourishes taken from Arcane Dimensions, for which the map was created.

name: The Slime Sanctuary
description: A medium sized metal-themed map for Copper

name: Dungeon Ascension
description: The conclusion of Chuma's original map saga.

name: Art Challenge
description: A quiz game of famous painters.

name: CyberVerse
description:
Dive into CyberVerse, a beta game set in the digital city of Cyberia on the Ergo Blockchain. Choose your career, from DJing to bartending, or unwind with activities like gardening and fishing, all while earning CYPX tokens.

But there's more! Level up your character, complete daily quests, customize your apartments, and explore a virtual world filled with exciting features, including a casino and global chat. Scavenge for resources in bins and loot boxes to craft unique items.

CyberVerse isn't just a game; it's an immersive urban adventure where your choices shape your digital destiny. Ready for the Cyberia life?

name: Swelldone
description: Swelldone is a multiplayer simulation game for virtual paddling and rowing in an open world with realistic wave models. In Arcade Mode, you can paddle or row real world venues on a variety of watercrafts. Get stoked surfing big swells to rack up points on the leaderboard and race against other players and NPCs!

name: The Elektra Complex
description: Medium sized Metal/Ebon style map.

name: Rune Rhetoric
description:
In Rune Rhetoric’s Earth, a portion of humans are able to use their Inner Rune, a mysterious and personal source of magic that they may channel through weapons or through spells.

The game takes place on a fictional continent, named Midmund, which is occupied by two dominant empires; The Reme Empire of the western half and the Hon Empire of the eastern half. Guess what? They're at war.

But the war isn't the real point here, it's just what is happening at the time. The player will experience the perspectives of several individuals in a nationalistic and hostile environment. Why do they fight in wars? Are their reasons for fighting good enough? Are they really fighting for what they think they are fighting for?

Step into the shoes of a lowly villager, Dahnzell, entranced by images of glory and a reclusive prince, Nero, starved of answers for profound questions in a fight for clarity and change.

name: Dreamblood
description: An episodic WAD for the 2020 Doom 64 remaster by HeadshotTAS featuring large, dynamic maps and challenging combat. Its first episode received one of the 2023 Cacowards.

name: Charon's Sabbath
description:
Upon death in the world of Charon's Sabbath, souls leave behind their physical bodies, immediately venture to the spiritual realm, and fuse with a sentient cluster of spiritual energy, called the Soulmother. However, when the Soulmother is suddenly dormant, the souls of the dead have nowhere to go and are left behind in the world of the living, unable to find peace, becoming lost.

These lost souls are completely cut off from interacting with the living. The boundary between the dead and the living is so extreme, the dead will perceive any spoken, written, or non-verbal language of the living as unintelligible. Lost souls are doomed to continuously relive their death through their memory. The vast majority of them descend to wrathful madness and insatiable hunger due to this hellish fate.

You play as Munica, the soul of a young girl, tasked by the weak Soulmother to gather the last of the lost souls that have yet to be tainted and help them find peace.

Sever the never-ending cycle of suffering, and realize salvation.

name: Halo's Mixtape
description:
A short winter story about the Witch of the Isle, who protects a Orb that many seek to try to claim.

Recently someone has broken into her Dungeon unbeknowst to her, and stolen a precious something!

name: Hardfest 2
description: Greetings mortals! Hardfest 2 is a community ﻿project for boom-compatible source ports that is focused on "hard maps" of any style, this time with a yellow theme! Featuring maps by 24 designers, there ﻿is a wide variety on offer, including large macroslaughter maps, tiny and precise combat puzzles, quiet exploration heavy maps & platforming maps. ﻿

name: Xombycapyse
description:
a seizure inducing negative romp into a dark world deep world filled with intrigue and swors. There also happen to be shields. The main character is set. He has a propensity for making treks to the forest and random people's houses. There is a time limit before the Xombycapyse occurs and this is the worst of the worst!

Made for the RMN 2012 Horror Game Contest in less than a day!

name: Usagito Watashi
description:
Made for a 'A Game By It's Cover 2016', based on the fantastic coverart by Achabox!

This details the adventures of Reido and Dr. Asagi as they wake up to a world under fire from all varieties of cosmic threat!

Experience the joys of space debris with a self destructive attitude, space stations long abandoned with stench of all the remnants of lives gone by, and also facing off with the immensity of the stars in classical famicom fashion.

name: Cave Escape With FNIA Chica
description: Chica was having a stroll in the forest until a rock slide happened you then walk in a cave and it starts to collapse now you must escape.

name: Solve et Coagula
description: Solve et Coagula is a limit-removing replacement for Doom Episode 2: The Shores of Hell created by Nicolas Monti that was a runner-up for the 2023 Cacowards.

name: Instead; Ghost Suburb
description: A mini-adventure game where the goal is to collect certain items in a village and bring them one at a time to the village shrine to open the largest building in the village, which is the northmost building.

name: Jaded
description: Jaded ﻿is a large ﻿﻿dark techbase slaughtermap by lunchlunch influenced by Fractured Worlds, Miasma, Magnolia, Abandon, Occula, and Newt. It was a runner-up at the 2023 Cacowards.

name: TNT 2: Devilution
description: TNT2 ﻿is a 32-map fan-made sequel to Team TNT﻿'s Evilution that originally began development in 2009. Its public beta received one of the 2023 Cacowards.

name: Green Ninja: Year of the Frog
description: It's the year of the frog, the celebrations are in full swing and you are on the menu! You escape the clutches of the evil ninjas. Now you must take revenge using your unstoppable kick.

name: Jumpcat
description: Jumpcat is a fast CPG (Cat-playing game), where you need to power jumps correctly to avoid the trees, rocks, helicopters, and missiles coming at you.

name: The Journey of Elisa
description: A patologic game about a term that isn't and should not be used anymore: Asperger

name: Overtime at Freddy's
description: Hello! Hello! Freddy Fazbear's Pizza welcomes you back to the night shift! Overtime at Freddy’s continues where Five Nights at Freddy’s left off. This game is more difficult than the original by intruding a few new features while staying true to the classic game.

name: Army Men: Mobile Ops
description: The main focus of Army Men Mobile Ops is to complete missions by destroying objects, killing enemies, collecting intel from enemy areas, and more. Each type of soldier provides different stats and weaponry. The arena of combat is decently unique. Being soldiers, these hardened plastic paratroopers fight it out on a kitchen table, playroom, hallway, and bathroom, each battlefield littered with household debris that makes for useful cover, or just as obstacles. Crates are at many areas around those battlefields destroy one, and your men may find ammo, medical kits, and others. Crates also can be kicked open to save ammo.

name: Spring Crisis 2
description: This is a 2D action game with more and more vegetables.

name: Army Men Strike: Toy Wars
description:
A brand-new version of Army Men Strike is now available: deploy defensive structures, protect your home base from enemy invasions, and experience the thrill of tower defending in the newly added Tower Defense game mode!

Play like a kid, fight like a man in a war without limits! Based on the toy army of your childhood, you must defend your flag against the enemy and attack using a powerful combination of tactics to win the miniature war between your green army and the evil toys! Lead an army of green soldiers, remote-control planes, robots, and many other toys in various epic battles! Defend yourself against the Tan Army invasion and put your strategy to the test. Using your best survival tactics is the only chance to win.

name: Gardens of the Void
description: Small idle game that I started working on out of boredom.

name: Being Dead Simulator
description:
Have you ever wondered how it is to be dead?

This great simulator will let you experience that, which would normally be out of human's reach.

Not only does it simulate the state of being dead, but also some (as for now) possible scenarios that may occur while being buried underground.

name: Exadimension Neptunia
description:
Ever watched the ending video of a Hyperdimension Neptunia game and wanted to play that 2D-style RPG? Now you can in this fan game!
Slay monsters, make video game references and break the fourth wall all in 2D Graphics! Two years after the events of Megadimension Neptunia VII, take control of your favorite characters from the world of Gamindustri as they face a new threat: the personification of present day video game industry problems!

name: Exadimension Neptunia 2: A Chao Returns
description:
Ever watched the ending video of a Hyperdimension Neptunia game and wanted to play that 2D-style RPG? Now you can in this fan game!
Slay monsters, make video game references and break the fourth wall all in 2D Graphics! Two years after the events of Exadimension Neptunia , take control of your 3 character as they face a new threat: the personification of present day video game industry problems!

name: Lux: Dream.Girl
description: Lux: Dream.Girl is a surreal psychological horror game created in RPG Maker 2003, about a socially inept teenage boy with writer's block who uses lucid dreaming to interact with his characters. In his dreams, he falls in love with a girl he has never seen or thought of before. It is the second entry in the -UX Series.

name: Träumerei: Chapter 0
description: Träumerei is an original Horror RPG game created in VX Ace. The game is focused on exploration, story, and characters. It contains original art, graphics, and sprites.

name: Top Duck
description:
Side-view platform game where you play as a duck.

It was seen on the August 1991 tape for Commodore Format.

name: Arctic Eggs
description: A Sci-Fi Cooking game where you take up the role of a Poultry Peddler stuck in Antarctica and longing for a way out. Sell your illegal eggs to those who look hungry.

name: Moonshire
description: Embark on a journey to save Moonshire as you navigate through a mysterious world filled with dungeons, weapons, upgrades, and fast-paced combat!

name: Mobile Suit Baba
description: A mysterious force is out to steal all the Fruit! Help Baba & friends foil their plans by maneuvering gigantic mech suits around. Features tactical puzzling action, heart-wrenching storytelling and extra challenges over a total of 43 missions.

name: Melting Moon
description: Melting Moon is a horror/dark fantasy game that is heavily story-based, and involves various mythologies to its world. What happens in the game and what happens to Luna is heavily influenced by what the player does or doesn't do in regards to the story and choices given. Luna can explore Havenfall and various locations in Hell and Purgatory as she finds pieces of her heart and saves (or doesn't save) souls afflicted with Soul Rot, all the while finding out her true self and her true purpose.

name: Grim's Gambit
description: Get ready for a tale where every cup poured is a step closer to unraveling the mysteries that bind the afterlife. Take on a soul-stirring quest as you serve lost souls, piece together your forgotten past, and unveil the chilling secrets of the Stygian Keep.

name: Sonic Colors DX
description:
Sonic Colors HD/DX is a bundle of original modifications to the original (wii) Sonic Colors on a modified version of the Dolphin Emulator, with the goal of bringing the game up to modern graphics standards.
This mod aims to be more faithful to the original design than Sonic Colors: Ultimate, while containing fewer glitches.

name: SMBW Randomizer
description: A Super Mario Bros. Wonder randomizer programmed in Python using a modular approach.

name: Tetris
description: Welcome to Tetris, the official mobile app for the world’s favorite puzzle game. Battle to be the last one standing in 100-player Tetris Royale mode, play a quick round to beat your own score, or play infinite rounds to master your skills in the Tetris Single Player modes. Tetris forever!

name: Tails of Iron: Bright Fir Forest
description: Set after the climactic events of the base campaign, ‘Bright Fir Forest’, a new free end-game expansion, sees our noble Rat King Redgi invited by the Squirrels to celebrate the Festival of Leaf Fall… However, a new foul and revenge-seeking adversary stands to ruin the celebrations.

name: I Think I Need Your Help
description:
A strange entity has been keeping Vela up at night so she calls her ex, Mira, to help her figure out what's going on, but none of them knew what they were getting themselves into. Together they venture into a forest full of strange creatures to find answers.

The game takes around 20 minutes and was made for Yuri Game Jam 2023.

name: Pebble Beach no Hatou Plus
description: Pebble Beach no Hatou Plus is the sequel to the Megadrive game Pebble Beach no Hatou that was released in 1994. Enjoy the 3D golf course set in a prestigious West Coast surrounded by the natural beauty. Pebble Beach is widely regarded as one of the most beautiful courses in the world. It hugs the rugged coastline and has wide open views of the ocean. 3D is a beautiful and faithful reproduction of the Pebble Beach golf course layout and graphic art.

name: Underfell: One Hell of a Show
description: An Underfell Fan-Game containing multiple battles! Fight against Mettaton, the killer robot with a penchant for stardom, who hopes to finally become popular with his most daring act yet: killing a human!

name: Escape from Arcturus
description:
Escape from Arcturus consist of two distinct action games: During the first part the player has to shoot down torpedoes which are launched from all four directions at the space fortress situated in the middle of the screen.

During the second part, the player has to defend several waves of incoming enemy spacecraft.

name: Coloring Pixels: Time Travel Pack
description: This Time Travel Book adds 20 new images to Coloring Pixels! Travel through the ages in this book. Go all the back to Prehistory and forward to the unknown future, stopping along the way at some of the most memorable era's!

name: Coloring Pixels: Sci-Fi Fantasy Vistas Pack
description: This Sci-Fi & Fantasy Vistas-themed book unlocks 20 additional levels for Coloring Pixels! The third Vistas book in Coloring Pixels, however, this iteration takes a dive into the Fictional and Fantastical!

name: Future Flash
description: Space Invaders clone

name: Final Ranger
description: Sin descripción

name: Space Battle
description: Galaxian clone.

name: Meteor
description: Asteroids clone

name: The Edge of Forever
description:
Far across the Dead Sea, beyond the shores of white sand are The Dragon's Teeth--heartless mountains consumed by cold howling winds and separated by valleys of icy fog. Nestled deep within is a small rocky pinnacle upon which rests the palace of The Guardian, the architect of the Vault of Knowledge.

For centuries people have visited the Guardian hoping for blessings and the chance to take the Trial of Knowledge but few have been granted the wish. After many wars and natural disasters the location of The Guardian eventually slipped from people's memories and was lost forever from maps. Only legends remain telling of the trial and the strange machines that seem to crackle with the power of the skies.

For years you have dreamt of finding the Vault and gaining the treasure of the ancients but the mountain paths have just led you round in circles. One day, while searching the northwest mountain peaks, you discovered a hidden trail marked with small piles of stones covered in unusual symbols. Something looks familiar and you suspect you have seen these symbols before in ancient books, but your memory is fading and you are not sure anymore.

After days of walking past countless marker stones, the trail eventually descended from the higher peaks towards a misty valley. Far off in the distance you could see a small hill with what seemed to be a man made structure on the top but you will need to get closer to find out.

The trail leads down into a dense forest shrouded in a thick miasma that chills you to the bone. The boughs creak and groan but there is no wind, just the fog blocking out the light above. Several days pass and eventually the winding trail leads upwards again, out of the mist. You stand before a small ornate building with glass on all sides.

You enter the main door...

name: Subs
description:
You are piloting a sub and trying to torpedo your enemy as many times as you can in the time allowed. You do not see your enemy nor does he see you except in the sonar, in fleeting occasional glances and in seeing where a torpedo came from.
Subs was produced by Atari in 1977.

name: In-Terror-Gation
description:
The game was developed in around 2 weeks for Senscape's Cursed Adventurous Jam 2022 (Won 3rd Place).In-Terror-Gation is a horror investigation game influenced by the works of Lovecraft and Junji Ito. As a psychiatrist at the Innsmount Prison Hospital, you are tasked with the interrogation of a mysterious patient in the hopes of getting to the truth behind a bizarre case of kidnapping.

Ask questions, listen to what she says, and examine your evidence to find the contradictions that may lie within. Only by questioning everything can you figure out the real truth about what happened to this patient, and just what is going on with her.

name: An American Tail: Animated Movie Book
description: Sin descripción

name: True Stalker
description: True Stalker is a fan-made game based on the S.T.A.L.K.E.R. series taking place after the events of Call of Pripyat, where you experience a completely original, lengthy storyline through the eyes of an ordinary stalker named Axe.

name: Forge
description: Forge is a deeply strategic map-based card game, fusing the real-time strategy, collectible card game, and deckbuilder genres. Coordinate your units and spells to take control of the map and outsmart your opponents. Discover the cards and find your strategy!

name: Drift 'n' Burn 365
description: Citizens of the future: start your engines and scream down tracks suspended high above earth's toxic ground. Choose your course, choose your car, and race towards victory with your head in the clouds. Hit your brakes on the corners to drift and earn nitro boosts, then burn by your opponents to collect the car of the day!

name: Drift 'n' Burn 2: My Racer
description: Drift 'n' Burn racing returns to the skies for a fully customizable battle every day! Build your own custom track to save and send to your friends. Choose a setting, add every curve and bend, then up the ante with loops, banks, and jumps! Play the Daily Challenge and unlock custom parts to enhance the look and performance of your car. Earn more powerful weapons to blow your opponents sky high in Battle mode, and drift into turns to earn nitro boosts so you can blast by your rivals. Satisfy your need for speed when you play today - and tomorrow!

name: Drift 'n' Burn 3: World Tour
description: Ready? Set? Race across the world in a bid to collect 100 cars in 100 days! Each day is a new race in one of 20 cities around the globe. Choose your track and speed to the finish against 4 opponents, drifting around corners and hitting the nitro to feel the burn.

name: Nyran Survivors
description: Embrace the role of Thoria's ultimate Mediator. In this gripping Action Roguelite, unlock diverse classes, harness thousands of spell combinations, and face epic boss battles. How long can you survive the endless enemy horde for?

name: Bloxd.io
description: It is a multiplayer sandbox game where you can build, explore, and compete in voxel worlds. Play with Friends in mini-games such as bedwars, skywars and more or unleash your creativity by designing your worlds.

name: Apple Boy: Attack of Ice Cream Man
description:
Welcome to Fruitbowl City! The villainous Ice Cream Man is seeking venegeance upon Apple Boy after being defeated by him. So, Apple Boy goes off to Ice Cream Man's Cloudy Castle to beat him up again.

This hack has 33 exits.

name: Apple Boy 2: Homebound Hero
description:
After the events of Apple Boy: Attack of Ice Cream Man, Apple Boy's been sent to the fantastic world of Teylornia! He doesn't want to be there, though, so after getting a helpful tip from a bald olding man, he sets out to collect the 12 Teleportation Gems, so he can get home to his beloved Fruitbowl City.

This hack has 45 exits.

name: War in Space
description:
It's my first game, but I'm working on improving and developing it every day. Suggestions for improvements or new features, modes or whatever in the comments.
Thank you!

War in space is a roguelike in the future where you fight against different enemies to defend yourself and get better equipped.
Can you save the universe and improve your life on your spaceship?

name: Oguzok Horror
description: Oguzok needs to peel off labels from bananas! He better make it fast because chef is very angry!

name: Bloody Ink
description: Bloody Ink brings your nightmares to life. Constant terror at home, mysteries to solve, and vocal interaction. Collect items, uncover Luca's past, and face your fears.

name: Meta Revelations: Armour of the Abyss
description: A turn based RPG where you can adapt your armour and save the world! You are Adena Krieger - a cold blooded huntress. Uncover your mysterious past and prevent a calamity that is written in your name.

name: Tom Sawyer no Bouken
description: The original Japanese version of The Adventures of Tom Sawyer. The level order is changed in the English version (perhaps so as not to confuse players by starting with the rafting stage). The Japanese original's level 5, the pirate ship, is the English version's level 1, both making the beginning of the game much more difficult, and making the plot non-coehesive.

name: Extreme Rally Run
description: Sin descripción

name: No Man's Land
description: The player has to destroy ervy tank in the area.

name: Cosmopolis
description: Sin descripción

name: Eagle
description: Galaxian clone

name: Pixelborn
description: Fanmade digital version of Lorcana

name: Disney Junior Magical Holiday
description: Disney Junior Magical Holiday is a Christmas themed mini-game compilation featuring characters from Disney Junior shows.

name: Duke Nukem Forever
description:
Prior to it's 2011 release, Duke Nukem Forever went through various different stages of development. The 1996 build of the game had a completely different style of gameplay compared to other builds of the game, where the game was intended to be a 2D side-scroller instead of a third person shooter.

On December 26, 2022, 4 prototype builds of the game was leaked onto 4Chan by x0r_jmp.

name: High School Private Tutor
description: You’re a gifted college student carefully balancing your studies with a part-time tutoring gig until an offer lands in your lap that just might be too good to be true. When your seemingly shy high school tutee falls head over heels for you during the very first lesson together, you’re suddenly thrust into a situation where your head is at war with your heart and your future may just be on the line if word of it ever gets out.

name: Skibidi Friends
description: Skibidi Friends is a co-op puzzle platformer based on the Skibidi Toilet meme.

name: Too Late . exe
description: It's time for you to pay the consequences.

name: Ice Scream 8: Final Chapter
description:
In this part of the Ice Scream Row the Kids trying to escape.
But Sister Madelin arrived at her sons Factory and is hunting the Kids too!
Rod has enough!
Rod says: "This hast become personal!"
We won't only See Rod and Sister Madeline, we will See 2 old "Friends" too!
Is it the last time we See Rod?

name: Friday Night Funkin': Mario's Madness v2
description:
Mario's Madness v2 Is Finally Here, 29 NEW and Remade Songs + the original 7 songs from v1, a lot of characters, stages, mechanics and new extra additions in the mod, Beat all the songs to try to defeat mario for good.

Be ready, survive, and say hello to murder.

name: Otona no Onna no Uranai Techou
description: A cancelled Nintendo DS game inspired by the Japan only game Tottoko Hamtaro: Tomodachi Daisakusen Dechu (Hamtaro: Operation Friend), of which would get reworked into the simulator Tomodachi Collection.

name: Six Six
description:
Imagine suddenly waking in an unfamiliar world of dangerous creatures! Only through exploration and the assistance of others can you stop the flow of evil into the world. Players will face many dangers in their travels, including horrible beasts like the Maple Goose or the Surly Caveman.

But the residents of this world are here to help, even if they sometimes need bribing or assistance themselves. If players can decipher the engaging puzzles, like which sandwich a guard might prefer as a random example, a world of possibilities will be revealed!

The game features 95 locations to explore, a plethora of enemies to battle, and a user interface developed specifically for the Rainbow 100 computer. Running in the Rainbow's rarely (possibly never?) used 66 column mode, the game caters to one of the most memorable personal computers of the 1980s that nobody actually uses anymore for anything. Developed entirely on an actual Rainbow 100, this game reflects dedication to a never-really-popular platform! Also available for other platforms...

name: Cruel
description: Fight your way through 10 floors with powerful guns, crunchy melee weapons and a mighty kick. Although you'd better be fast, as you only have one life, and you're on the clock!

name: Carriers at War
description:
Naval wargame, a remake of the 1984 Carriers at War. It is based on World War II naval warfare and focuses on the Pacific Theater.

Exactly like the original game, this remake contains 6 scenarios based on the Attack on Pearl Harbor, the Battle of the Coral Sea, the Battle of Midway, the Battle of the Eastern Solomons, the Battle of the Santa Cruz Islands, and the Battle of the Philippine Sea.

name: Dungeon Rummage: Rise of the Allies!
description: Dungeon Rummage - Rise of the Allies is a short dungeon crawler created for the Harold Jam 2023, Ascend of the Allies. Pick your character and escape the dungeon, where the allies are currently held hostage.

name: Project-X & Ultimate Body Blows
description: Sin descripción

name: Chew Chew Mimic
description:
Play as a hungry mimic in this head-scratching puzzle game where you have to guide unsuspecting knights to their doom.

Lay down traps to get all the knights to the mimic and try to collect each level’s 3 coins for an extra challenge.

name: Kharkov: Disaster on the Donets - Across the Dnepr: Second Edition
description:
Across the Dnepr: Second Edition is an expansion for Kharkov: Disaster on the Donets developed by Strategic Studies Group. It also serves as a remake of their 2003 game Decisive Battles of WWII: Across the Dnepr.

The main scenario is based on the historical World War II battle known as the Battle of Smolensk (1941). It also contains 3 additional scenarios: Operation Husky, Operation Konrad, and Kirovograd.

name: Paper Mario: The Origami King Refolded
description: Sin descripción

name: Pikmin 2 Infernal Edition
description: A kaizo romhack for Pikmin 2 that limits your maximum Pikmin to 60, makes enemies and hazards stronger and more deadly, the Pikmin and captains much weaker, and more. Made by Antopikmin

name: Mario Bros.: Lost World
description: Sin descripción

name: Last Seen Online
description: “last seen online” is a psychological horror escape room, based on early flash games. Look through someone's computer files. Solve puzzles and discover the secrets that lie within the computer.

name: Pikmin Lost Hope
description: This mod / ROM hack for Pikmin 2 includes 11 chapter levels, with (almost) no caves, remixed areas and treasures.

name: Mario Adventure III
description: A mod of Super Mario Bros. 3, sequel to Mario Adventure.

name: Chaomin
description: Sin descripción

name: Earthion
description:
Earthion is an upcoming aftermarket shooting game developed by Ancient primarily for the Sega Mega Drive. Physical MD versions will be published by SUPERDELUXE GAMES in Japan and by Limited Run Games in North America. The game will also get a 16:9 version for modern platforms.

Earthion is published under the label YKGGG, a brand name covering all the retro-style games developed at Ancient. If Earthion meets success, Ancient will go on the venture of releasing video games designed for retro consoles. A separate version of the game for Arcade was confirmed by Ancient and published by exA-Arcadia, which features a new, exclusive mode that will not be available in the Mega Drive version.

name: Super Mario Sunshine Seaside
description: Sin descripción

name: Super Mario Journey Lane
description: Sin descripción

name: The Koopa Who Stole Christmas
description: The Koopa Who Stole Christmas is a Christmas themed community ROM hack of Super Mario 64 DS, made by Hailbot and several contributors. The hack features 10 Main Courses and 1 Side Course.

name: Super Mario Galaxy 2: Collectors Anxiety
description: Sin descripción

name: Tricky Super Mario Bros. U
description: Sin descripción

name: Tell me tonight was real
description: A game about two friends with benefits, a vampire and a human going on a impromptu date and realizing they are in love.

name: Luigi's Mansion Beta Restoration (+) Plus
description: Sin descripción

name: MTV Jersey Shore
description: MTV Jersey Shore is a Facebook RPG based on the popular and controversial reality television series set in Seaside Heights, New Jersey. The game has you play as different cast members such as Snooki, the Situation, and more. The game is an online arcade-style turn-based combat, but players can also undertake a variety of activities reminiscent of the show, such as hitting the gym, tanning, doing laundry, shopping and partying, allowing them to earn coins and XP.

name: Data Worm
description: Data Worm is a modern take on the classic video game "Snake." Set in a circular map, players navigate a digital worm that grows longer as it consumes data scattered throughout, picks up an array of power-ups and avoids obstacles in the form of viruses Unlike the traditional linear movement of the original Snake game, Data Worm offers free movement within the circular environment.

name: Shark Attack
description: In this game you play the man-hunting shark for a change and try to kill the divers who are set out to kill you.

name: Space Bugger
description: Sin descripción

name: Bendy and the Ink Machine: Chapter Five
description: This is the fifth and final chapter of Bendy and the Ink Machine, continuing and concluding the game. On 6th September 2018 it was announced all players who owned chapters two to four would receive it for free on 26th October 2018.

name: Airborne
description: Airborne is a combination of 2D Platformers, Rage Games, Parkour, while also being packed with Action. You need to get to the end of the level by dodging Spikes, Bullets, Turrets, Lasers and more!

name: Mugen no Shinzou III
description: Mugen no Shinzou III is a Role-Playing game, developed and published by XTALSOFT, which was released in Japan in 1990.

name: The Apartment
description:
The Apartment is a short RPG-Maker horror experience, about Joe Malcom, a resident of an apartment. After he receives books from his neighbour, after her husband commited suicide, strange things start to happen. Perhaps the same books offer an explaination on what is happening.

A speciality of the game is, that everything happens in this one room apartment.

name: Draco D
description: Draco D, a casual dragon arcade game where players soar through enchanting levels, unleashing unique breath weapons and collecting magical power-ups to conquer foes. Maneuver through perilous obstacles, defeat monsters for rewards, and aim for high scores in this exhilarating quest.

name: Cherry Tower
description: Enter the world of Cherry Tower, a charming 2D pixel platformer that will take you on a sweet adventure unlike any other! Join Cherry on her small adventure climbing tower to return home and maybe even more. Overcome obstacles and traps to achieve your goals.

name: Battle Santa 64
description:
Play as Santa Claus trying to take back the presents stolen by Bowser, Wario, and Donkey Kong!

You have five minutes to collect as many as you can. They will run away so you will need to chase them down, hit them, and pick up the presents they drop. After five minutes you will see how many you have collected, what your high score is, and can restart by holding A and B simultaneously to try again.

name: R Wheel
description: R Wheel is a fast-pased one-button game. Try to survive inside a spinning wheel with spikes. Press a button to jump and hold a button to stay in the air longer. But your jumps release a wave that spawns the spikes. Collect bonus items to release a wave that clears the spikes and score points by clearing them. The game is over when you hit the spikes.

name: Air Fight: Sky Fighters
description: Prepare to take to the skies in an adrenaline-pumping adventure like no other with "Air Fight - Sky Fighters." Immerse yourself in the heart-pounding world of aerial combat, where you'll pilot cutting-edge fighter jets through intense dogfights and exhilarating missions that will test your skills, reflexes, and strategic thinking.

name: Defender II
description: Save the humanoids from the impending aliens in the sequel to Defender. The task is still rescuing humanoids before Landers can turn them into Mutants, while avoiding and shooting other foes, however you must now carry humanoids to safety through the Stargate of the title. Entering this Stargate not only warps you to the nearest humanoid in jeopardy, but can also warp you ahead (while on the first 15 levels) if you enter it with 4 or more humanoids, and give you extra lives if you warp with 10 humanoids, so there is a trade-off between guaranteeing the safety of existing humanoids, and trying to advance your position There are more enemies on screen than ever before. The Inviso button makes you invisible to enemies, but also to yourself, so you will have to follow your bullets to work out where on the screen you are.

name: Truck Drag Racing Legends
description: Get ready to unleash the adrenaline-fueled fury of raw power on the asphalt! Dominate the tracks as you steer through an array of formidable challenges and rivals.

name: Truck Simulator Driver USA 2024
description: Truck Simulator Driver USA is an exciting video game that lets you experience the thrill of driving a truck in America.

name: Stargate
description: Sin descripción

name: Stargate
description: An unreleased prototype port of the popular Williams game Stargate. The sequel to Defender and much like the arcade game you fly around blasting aliens and trying to survive long enough to save humanoids. You also have a Hyperspace button that can teleport you to a random area which can be good or bad. Also new in Stargate was an Inviso button that would cloak your fighter for a limited time.

name: Qix
description: In this game, you guide a marker which must draw rectangles and other weird objects in order to claim your territory, and you can either draw these rectangles fast or slow. Drawing the rectangles using the "slow" method awards you the most points. Once a rectangle has been made, it will be colored in to show that you have claimed your territory. While drawing the rectangles, you need to watch out for Qix (pronounced "kicks"), a series of colored lines that crawl the screen. In addition to Qix, you also need to avoid the Sparks who travel around the border, as well as any lines that you have made, as well as The Fuse, who travels along the line that you are drawing. Once you have claimed enough territory, you proceed to the next level.

name: Sadturn
description: A short autobiographical maze game. It's 2171. You are a human born in the Saturnian shellworld, a habitational megastructure built between the icy rocks in Saturn's rings. Searching for a life as a sailor, you embark on a journey to Earth.

name: BioMetal Gust

name: Hehe
description: A 2D platformer about saving a sugar cube from tea monsters.

name: Family Ties
description: Discover the power within you, challenge the hardships of life, and keep your family together in this epic game called 'Family Ties.' Take on the challenging tasks that await you and seize control of your life. Stand strong in the face of life's sudden twists because there's a hero within you!

name: Chili Time
description: Short flash game chili eating contest made popular by the famous Jerma.

name: Poker Warlords
description: Poker meets autobattler: Poker Warlords fuses the thrill of poker with the fun of an autobattler, creating a groundbreaking, genre-defying strategy game. Enter a world where each card represents an army and poker hands spring into life to battle for the pot.

name: Hamster Hunter
description: You come home for an annual family reunion, only to find your family missing with an eerie note left by your father. After you discover what has happened you seek revenge!

name: Dreams of Saturn
description: Dreams of Saturn is a Shenmue Xmas fan game from George Kitchen. The game features around 10-15 hours worth of content in the form of a short Shenmue story, taking place before and after the events of the original Shenmue, along with a wide variety of mini-games, achievements and more.

name: Toki
description: Sin descripción

name: Sonic Anniversary
description: A cancelled PlayStation Portable port of Sonic Generations that was cancelled very early in development when it was still under the name Sonic Anniversary.

name: Star of Quiz
description:
"Star of Quiz" is a quiz game released by Sunsoft.
It was released on PC Engine SUPER CD-ROM2 in 1992.

name: Toki
description: Sin descripción

name: Super Piracy Quest
description:
Long ago, an unknown figure took control of THE CAVE OF HYPE and put an end to PIRACY. Embark on a journey with our protagonist and deuteragonist, Pikachu and Dr. Andonuts respectively to save PIRACY, but more importantly to find one of the greatest artifacts THE CAVE OF HYPE has to offer...THE BAG. Throughout this journey they will meet very few helpful people, and many cows!

Download link: https://rpgmaker.net/games/13022/

description: A collection of over 1000 shareware games.
